basics.name: Masahiro Negishi
basics.label: 1st year master's student
basics.summary: A first-year master's student at the Department of Computer Science, Graduation School of Information Science and Technology, the University of Tokyo.

work.name: K.K. BEST PATH RESEARCH
work.summary: I was involved in developing an OCR system used in one of Japan's most pupular mobile apps.

work.name: MATSUO INSTITUTE, INC
work.summary: I was involved in research on building large-scale world models. As part of the outcome of the large-scale world model project, I wrote 'Scaling Laws of Dataset Size for VideoGPT' as the first author and gave an oral presentation at the 37th Annual Conference of the Japanese Society for Artificial Intelligence. I also co-authored two papers.

education.institution: The University of Tokyo, Tokyo, Japan
The University of Tokyo, Tokyo, Japan

awards.title: Honorable Mention
awards.awarder: School of Science, the University of Tokyo
awards.summary: I was honored for my senior thesis, 'Pairwise-constraint Classification in Weakly Supervised Machine Learning: Risk-consistent Approach and Classifier-consistent Approach.'
